StepDescription.3: WS: Slip 1 as if to knit (YIB), Purl, knit last stich
StepDescription.4: RS: Slip 1 as if to purl thru back loop (YIF), knit, purl last stitch
StepDescription.5: {TCSS}, Knit 1, INV-R, knit to last 3, INV-L, knit 1, {TCSS}
StepDescription.6: Continue to 30" (100 stitches per row), ~264 rows
StepDescription.7: Sloped bind off 4 stiches at beginning of row
StepDescription.8: Sloped bind off 4 stiches at beginning of row
StepDescription.9: Mark off Center 16 stiches (30 on each side
StepDescription.10: Bind off 4, knit to 1st marker, bind off btw markers, knit to end
StepDescription.11: Put 26 from beginning of row onto stitch holder
